lead_paragraph: A report by the the European Commission, the E.C.B. and the I.M.F. says Greece’s second bailout package can make its debt sustainable, but Athens will have to stick to its austerity measures.
snippet: A report by the the European Commission, the E.C.B. and the I.M.F. says Greece’s second bailout package can make its debt sustainable, but Athens will have to stick to its austerity measures....

headline.print_headline: Troika Sees Much Hard Work Still Ahead for Greece
headline.main: Officials See Much Hard Work Still Ahead for Greece
